duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage ongoing relationships with external partners, such as hospitals, universities, and enterprises.
Serve as the primary point of contact for partners and ensure effective bidirectional communication.
Work across teams and organizations to execute on care coordination initiatives.
Supervise inbound and outbound referrals, keeping patient and provider experience at the center.
Design, schedule, and conduct in-services with partner teams.
Ensure adherence to service level agreements (SLAs) and internal KPIs.
Coordinate and facilitate meetings between partnership stakeholders.
Use Salesforce to accurately track partner-related activities.

education_certification.credential: 2+ years of experience in account management and/or clinical case management
